speaker.whotheyare: Jens Burchardt is BCG's global expert on climate impact and cofounder of its Center for Climate Action.
speaker.whylisten: Jens Burchardt advises clients in the private and public sectors on how to prepare for a low-carbon economy and how to win in low-carbon technologies, such as hydrogen, power-to-x and carbon capture, utilization and storage (CCUS). He is the author of several landmark BCG publications on climate change and a regular speaker on the climate transition. He has advised the World Economic Forum (WEF), the Conference of the Parties (COP) unit and several German government commissions on decarbonization.
